channel.title: Projects on James Ebiloma - Cybersecurity Portfolio
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on James Ebiloma - Cybersecurity Portfolio

item.title: Network Scanner Tool
item.description:
A Python-based network scanning tool that identifies active hosts, open ports, and running services. Features multi-threading for faster scans and detailed reporting.

Features

  • Multi-threaded port scanning for fast results
  • Service version detection
  • OS fingerprinting
  • Export results to CSV and JSON
  • Interactive CLI interface

How It Works

The tool leverages Python’s socket library combined with threading to perform concurrent port scans across target hosts. Results are parsed and formatted into detailed reports.

item.title: Password Strength Checker
item.description: Web application that analyzes password strength using entropy calculations, common pattern detection, and breach database checks.

item.title: Vulnerable Web App Lab
item.description: Practice environment demonstrating common web vulnerabilities (XSS, SQL Injection, CSRF) for learning purposes. Built with intentional security flaws.
